mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team (user_id, id, name, primary_club, founded_date, closure_date, league_id, country_id, bot) VALUES (#{team.userId}, #{team.id}, #{team.name}, #{team.primaryClub}, #{team.foundedDate}, #{team.closureDate}, #{team.leagueId}, #{team.countryId}, #{team.bot}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = #{team.name}, primary_club = #{team.primaryClub}, founded_date = #{team.foundedDate}, closure_date = #{team.closureDate}, league_id = #{team.leagueId}, country_id = #{team.countryId}, bot = #{team.bot};
